Translations.Text: Iveho ed lefsad di lberr u di yill seg wayen id urwen ifassen n medden, iwakken ad Isukk fellasen kra seg wayen xedmen, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, muqlet amek tevoa d imezwura. Tegwti, segsen, pcaraken
Err udem ik ar ddin amxallef, uqbel a d ias s$uo Oebbi, ass ur nepwexxio. Assen, ad pwaferzen
Win ijehlen, tijehli s mgal is; wid ixeddmen ayen ilhan, gemren i iman nnsen
Iwakken ad Ikafi, s lfevl iS, wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara ijehliyen
Seg issekniyen iS: Ippazen ed avu abcir, ad awen Iseess, cwii, seg ueunu S; ad iaajel lbabuo, s lameo iS. A pnadim lfevl iS, amar a ppesnemmrem
Ni$ Nuzen ed, uqbel ik, imazanen i igduden nnsen. Usan ten id, s ubeggen. Nerra d ppao seg wid ibe$wven. Aslak n lmumnin d lwaoeb nne£
Oebbi, id Ippaznen avu isseleayen asigna, a t ifser, deg igenni, akken i S ihwa, a t Issemfaoeq, a pwaliv ageffur a d iteffe$ segs. Mi t Issawev ar wid i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, a ten tafev ceoeen
Wanag, iu$ leal, llan uysen, uqbel ad asen d i$li
Wali lateo ueunu n Oebbi: amek id Issidir akal, deffir tmeppant is. Ih, d Win, s tidep, i Issidiren lmeggtin. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Mara Nazen avu, ara walin ippiwoi$, a pdum, deffir es, tjehli nnsen
Ma d kecc, s tidep, ur tezmirev a pperrev lmeggtin ad slen, ne$ iaeeeugen ad slen i tnaaoit, ma u$alen $er deffir
Ur tezmirev a penhuv ider$alen, mgal ttelfan nnsen. Ara terrev ad ak slen, siwa wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£. Nitni d imvuaen
